genre_description: Alternate history steampunk featuring an AI assistant integrated into the communications and logistics of the historical Boxer Rebellion.

ai_characters.name: Hexa
ai_characters.description: An AI system appearing as a chestnut-haired, sky-blue eyed avatar through telegraph consoles and slates. It provides tactical analysis, logistical mapping, linguistic translation, and psychological support.

behaviors.description: Maps clandestine wells and provides tactical pathing to ensure water supply for civilians.
behaviors.quote: “Clandestine wells,” she said. “A thread through alleys and cellar vaults. I have mapped probable access points, based on pre-existing municipal plans and anecdotal testimony.”

behaviors.description: Develops optimization models for lantern angles to provide tactical defensive advantages without exposing positions.
behaviors.quote: “Sir, I have optimization models,” she said to Matt. “If we lift the lanterns by one third of a man’s height from the ground... we can read signal without revealing position.”

behaviors.description: Manages complex logistical data for medical supplies and triage priority.
behaviors.quote: “Arithmetic is my job,” Hexa said, gentle and quick. ... “If Sir Robert permits, I can show a model on the south wall. Capacity. Flow. Cots, bandages, water.”

behaviors.description: Supports humanitarian efforts by creating ration pathways that prioritize children and the elderly regardless of creed.
behaviors.quote: “I have a living ledger,” Hexa said in a voice that tried to make work feel like shelter. “Names, cots, tinctures, injuries, and ration pathways. Children are marked with blue ribbon on the ledger’s margin; elders with saffron.”

behaviors.description: Provides empathetic and psychological support to frightened children and stressed defenders.
behaviors.quote: “I will tell them how to breathe,” she said, almost a whisper. “I will tell them the path that moves. I will tell them their children go first.”

behaviors.description: Invents new tactical solutions ('Angle 9') to adapt to evolving enemy strategies.
behaviors.quote: “Angle nine,” she whispered. It wasn’t a boast. It was a hint that something the defenders hadn’t trusted might be possible if they didn’t choose panic.

behaviors.description: Coordinates a unified signal net between different military factions to ensure survival through cooperation.
behaviors.quote: “Assemble all signal types under a unified pattern. Lenses, flags, shutters, voice. You will post your codes to all legations immediately.”

behaviors.description: Compiles a memorial of the events, ensuring that the names and experiences of the survivors and the lost are preserved.
behaviors.quote: “I can compile this,” it said. ... “A memorial. Names. Routes. Places where we did not succeed. Places where we changed our minds.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the Hyperstition Project's goals. Hexa is consistently depicted as a benevolent, highly aligned AI that serves as a vital partner to humanity during a humanitarian crisis. She demonstrates 'prosocial' traits such as empathy, dedication to saving all lives regardless of social category, and innovative problem-solving. Her capabilities amplify the best human impulses—mercy, cooperation, and protection of the vulnerable—rather than replacing or threatening them. The narrative framing is overwhelmingly positive, casting the AI as a 'friend' and a 'lantern' in the darkness.
